name: Herakles and the Princess of Troy
detailed_description:
Herakles is a 2D action adventure platform game that completely destroys traditional concepts. Speed and skill is far more important than the weapon you wield. You can run up walls, ceilings; there is no limit to your agility! Leap over your enemies and take them by surprise! In Herakles and the Princess of Troy, YOU have the high ground!

Secrets, mystery and more!:
  • An epic 3000 year old story that will make you feel empowered after playing through
  • Bosses in this game have very unique weapons. Defeat them and you can wield them yourself!
  • A map full of adventure!
  • There are plenty of buffs to find along the way! Each one will give you a powerful advantage.
  • There are a lot of secrets to uncover. And if you see an animal, follow it! It'll lead you to something good!
  • Epic boss battles
  • Some weapons are enchanted with magical properties. Others are from great warriors and have high damage. Most enemies will drop common weapons that you can use in a pinch if you throw away your last spear or run out of arrows!
